Player History
Drafted in 18th round, 285th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/29/2016, off Alonso Maestas (SLB)...
Earned first career win on 8/16/2016...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2017, going 3-0, 0.70...
Injured on 5/19/2018 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 10/2/2019 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2020, winning 2 games with a 1.20 ERA...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/15/2021 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/14/2022 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
8/19/2022: Signed a contract extension with Chicago, $1,500,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Gold Glove at Pitcher in 2023...
